model

Class Hunter

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Hunter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Hunter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    A simple model of a hunter. He can walk and shoot rabbits and foxes
    Version:
    2012.02.07
    Author:
    Marco, Malcolm, Harold
